contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|shu|属|树}} '''Shu''' may refer to: * [[Shu (Egyptian deity)]] * 蜀 (Shǔ), an abbreviation of [[Sichuan]] province of the People's Republic of China, as well as the following historical regimes that have existed in this region: **[[Shu (state)]] (蜀国/蜀國 or 古蜀), a state during the Zhou Dynasty era (c. 1046 BCE – c. 316) **[[Shu Han]] (蜀汉/蜀漢), a state that existed during the Three Kingdoms Period (221–263) **[[Cheng Han]] (成汉/成漢), also named Later Shu (后蜀/後蜀), one of the Sixteen Kingdoms (304–347) **[[Western Shu]] (西蜀), also named Qiao Shu (谯蜀/譙蜀), one of the units of the Eastern Jin period (405–413) **[[Former Shu]] (前蜀), one of the divisions of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period (907–925) **[[Later Shu]] (后蜀/後蜀), one of the divisions of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period (934–965) * the Kazakh name for the [[Chui River]] * [[Shu, Kazakhstan]] * The ancient Chinese ''[[Classic of History]]'' (''Shū'' 書) ;People * Shu, the guitarist in the Japanese rock band, [[BACK-ON]] * [[Frank Shu]] (born 1943), Chinese-American professor of astronomy * [[Dong Zhongshu]], Han Dynasty Chinese scholar * [[Shu Shibutani]] (born 1979), Japanese professional wrestler ;Fictional characters * [[Blue Dragon#Characters|Shu]], the main character in the Xbox 360 game ''Blue Dragon'' * [[List of Dragon Ball characters#Pilaf|Shu]], a character in the ''[[Dragon Ball]]'' franchise * [[Shu (Suikoden)|Shu (''Suikoden'')]], a character in the video game ''Suikoden II'' * Shu Shirakawa, a recurring character in the ''[[Super Robot Wars]]'' video game series * [[List of Fist of the North Star characters#Shū|Shū]], a fictional character in the ''Fist of the North Star'' manga and anime franchise * Shu, a fictional character in the manga series ''[[Hikaru no Go]]'' * Shuzo "Shu" Matsutani, a character in the anime series ''[[Now and Then, Here and There]]'' and ''[[Legendz]]'' '''SHU''' may be an acronym for: *[[Sacred Heart University]], in Fairfield, Connecticut *[[Scoville Heat Unit]], a measurement of ''hotness'' or spiciness in food *[[Security Housing Unit]], a solitary confinement space in a maximum security prison *[[Seton Hall University]], in South Orange, New Jersey *[[Seton Hill University]], in Greensburg, Pennsylvania *[[Shanghai University]] (上海大学), in Shanghai, China *[[Sheffield Hallam University]], a modern university in Northern England *[[Shih Hsin University]] (世新大學), in Taipei, Taiwan *[[Special Handling Unit]], a super maximum security prison located in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec {{Disambiguation|geo|school}}
